# 秘密全集

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/mimi-quanji
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/mimi-quanji
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install mimi-quanji
mimi-quanji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g mimi-quanji
mimi-quanji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
